basics.label: Secretary - Finance Division
basics.summary: An energetic, skillful and dedicated Administrative Assistant offering versatile office management, planning and detailed skills. Able to provide extensive experience of administrative support, organization, time management and confidentiality for executive-level staff of daily operations and functions. Ambitious and goal-oriented individual looking to obtain a position at a successful company which offers opportunities for professional growth.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Began job-sharing between the Finance and Communications & Marketing divisions in August of 2014. Duties within the Finance division include, manage records retention for department, professionally respond to daily phone calls, filing, organizing, edit and proofread documents and marketing collateral, creating various types of documents such as letters, memorandums, invoices, vouchers, creating and managing committee meeting agendas (Finance and Investment Advisory Committees), handling and managing all Massage Establishment permits in Brea, assisting Finance Manager with Lease Revenue and Water Bonds, Recognized Obligation Payments Schedule (ROPS), providing support to other divisions such as Purchasing, Information Technology and Human Resources while maintaining privacy, supervising Volunteen annually.
highlights: professionally respond to daily phone calls
edit and proofread documents and marketing collateral
creating various types of documents such as letters, memorandums, invoices, vouchers

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage work flow of office, work with city council and executives on various events including city council meetings, professionally respond to multiple daily phone calls regarding a wide range of subjects, revise Desk Diary, press releases, flyers, social media, create presentations for meetings, maintain equipment inventory, Department Coordinator, Weight Room Rehabilitation, Employee
